attributes.action: Automatic Deselection of any MP found to have misused their expenses unlawfully
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people, petition the Government to take action by automatic deselection of any Member of Parliament, guilty of falsely claiming on personal expenses

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
